lead_paragraph: Tommy Kono, who took up weightlifting in an internment camp for Japanese-Americans and went on to win two Olympic gold medals for the United States, has died. He was 85.

headline.print_headline: Olympic Weightlifting Champion Tommy Kono Dies in Hawaii
headline.main: Olympic Weightlifting Champion Tommy Kono Dies in Hawaii
